info_head: Automatic snooze mode mode can be configured according to the time selected in the settings screen.
info_first_day: When The alarm is on and the button is active, the alarm will fire one time
info_second_day: When The alarm is on and the button is active, the alarm will fire twice in margin of few minutes (according to the selection at the settings screen)
info_third_day: When The alarm is on and the button is active, the alarm will fire three times in margin of few minutes (according to the selection at the settings screen)
info_remove_alarm: In order to remove alarm, long press this button which located at the top left corner of every alarm
info_ringtone_update: You must approve notifications for this app (it won't work on silent mode) and select a ringtone at the ringtones tab before setting the alarm, otherwise the ringtone will be the default or the previously set one
contact: To report bugs or comments, long press the email address:
